A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An amazing Sequel for the newest trilogie of Star Wars. A lot of not expected humor in it. But definitely not too much. Some humor really hits and there are some misses. What the movie definitely not misses is depth. The last resistance has to take a lot of losses. 
A lot of surprises come up. A lot of storylines you think you know where they're going but end up somewhere you never thought it could go. You never even you that would have been a possibility. The movie definitely ends with a lot of hope even though we have to take a lot of losses of major characters throughout the movie.

PS: Don´t let this Audiencescore fool you. Yeah! the movie took a lot of bold choice but that´s how you move a franchise forward. And Yeah there is one particular sequence in this movie that wasn´t the best but that isn´t the whole movie! 
Also: A lot of this audience reviewers are trolls! Especially the ones giving 0 to 1 Stars. Just look at their profile\, how many reviews they made and when they joined Rotten Tomatoes.
